channel.title: A7x release!
channel.description:
Credits: Delta 80% for the base :o 1xiix1 5% for full dueling Me ar-temi-s 15% for stuff i added :p
Hey there moparscape people!
I am release my server! :p
Features:*most of the stuff already in deltascape :P* [size=20pt]i did not add any of these![/size] Full dueling* credits go to 1xiix1 Pest control fight pits wildy levels full fight cave
Features i added: didn't post all login to find out all :p added xp gain from Pest control added Npc's to pestcontrol that attack you! added npc on the pest control boat to tell you how much time till game starts added npc in fight pit waiting room to tell how much time till match starts
Updates to look forward to in V2 New home Better shops Actual Pestcontrol monsters
Pictures
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/m7yq95.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2im9w5y.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/4uw6de.png[/img]
Now the download links!!
http://uppit.com/N6LYZD http://www.MegaShare.com/562256 http://www.megaupload.com/?d=82FCZ5HD
[size=15pt]Warning if you do not know how to code, there is no use downloading this because there is a anti-leech in it!![/size]

item.title: A7x release!
item.dc:creator: @The_Graphics The Graphics
item.description:
@The_Graphics wrote:

You put anti-leech in a fail server?

Read full topic

item.title: A7x release!
item.dc:creator: @idkman idkman
item.description:
@idkman wrote:

Wow.
That is the easiest anti-leach I have ever seen in my life.

java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "//rofl what a nooby anti lee ch huh? i hope you can figure out how to change :O" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.main(server.java:98)
line 98 of server.java

			serverlistenerPort = Integer.parseInt(p.getProperty("ServerPort")

since deltascape loads it’s port from an .ini file.
Look in server.ini .

ServerPort=//rofl what a nooby anti leech huh? i hope you can figure out how to change :O

to

ServerPort=43594

Gf.

Read full topic

item.title: A7x release!
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

[quote=“JuzEh, post:44, topic:254864”]Not gonna lie, all of you are gimps. Sure this is rude, but I can’t get over how much time you people are wasting coding ‘MoparScape Private Servers’. Yea sure, I use to do it :)… until I found out it was a complete and utter waste of time of my life :D.

I just felt like posting here because I love seeing geeks burn. You’ll probably say ‘n00b den y r u luukin hear? fk hed LoL gtFo!’… I scrolled across these shit forums while searching for a flash game :]]

To all, have fun coding mopar (LOL).[/quote]
lol’d and reported for spam

Read full topic

item.title: A7x release!
item.dc:creator: @JuzEh JuzEh
item.description:
@JuzEh wrote:

Not gonna lie, all of you are gimps. Sure this is rude, but I can’t get over how much time you people are wasting coding ‘MoparScape Private Servers’. Yea sure, I use to do it :)… until I found out it was a complete and utter waste of time of my life :D.

I just felt like posting here because I love seeing geeks burn. You’ll probably say ‘n00b den y r u luukin hear? fk hed LoL gtFo!’… I scrolled across these shit forums while searching for a flash game :]]

To all, have fun coding mopar (LOL).
[center] Guess you don’t need to post here anymore if it’s a waste of time? In other words, you’re only here to cause trouble. Should you decide to be a little more civil in the future, contact staff if you’d like to be unmuted. [/center]

Read full topic

item.title: A7x release!
item.dc:creator: @_RDS-Pkerz `RDS-Pkerz
item.description:
@_RDS-Pkerz wrote:

[quote=“ar-temi-s, post:1, topic:254864”][size=20pt]any bullshit spam like deltascape based epic fail! or any shit like that or all you did was add npc’s and move object’s will be considerd spamm and reported![/size]

Credits:
Delta 80% for the base :o
1xiix1 5% for full dueling
Me ar-temi-s 15% for stuff i added

Hey there moparscape people!

I am release my server!

Features:most of the stuff already in deltascape
Full dueling* credits go to 1xiix1
Pest control
fight pits
wildy levels
full fight cave

Features i added:
added xp gain from Pest control
added Npc’s to pestcontrol that attack you!
added npc on the pest control boat to tell you how much time till game starts
added npc in fight pit waiting room to tell how much time till match starts

Updates to look forward to in V2
New home
Better shops
Actual Pestcontrol monsters

Pictures

Now the download links!!

http://uppit.com/N6LYZD
http://www.MegaShare.com/562256

[size=15pt]Warning if you do not know how to code, there is no use downloading this because there is a anti-leech in it!![/size][/quote]
